mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (board_no, user_no, content, created_at) VALUES (#{boardNo}, #{userNo}, #{content}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT l.name AS lawyer_name, l.profile AS lawyer_profile_image, c.content, c.created_at, c.user_no AS user_no FROM comment c JOIN lawyer l ON c.user_no = l.no WHERE c.board_no = #{boardNo} ORDER BY c.created_at ASC

SELECT c.no AS commentId, b.no AS boardNo, b.title AS boardTitle, c.content AS content, c.created_at AS createdAt FROM comment c JOIN board b ON c.board_no = b.no WHERE c.user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY c.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment WHERE user_no = #{userNo}

SELECT c.no AS commentId, c.board_no AS boardNo, c.user_no AS userNo, l.name AS lawyerName, l.profile AS lawyerProfileImg, c.content AS content, c.created_at AS createdAt FROM comment c JOIN lawyer l ON c.user_no = l.no WHERE c.no = #{commentId}
mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET content = #{dto.content}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE no = #{commentId}
